JobFullDesc: Are you looking to make an immediate impact where you can help our clients solve their business challenges? Deloittes Core Business Operations (CBO) portfolio operates at the center of our clients business. By joining our team, you could help C-suite and program leaders transform their organization and accelerate mission execution through emerging and disruptive technologies, innovative business models, retooled program operations and industry-driven solutions.Work youll do  Demonstrated expertise and portfolio of products developed for the web  Track record of building user interfaces, APIs, or backend services  Creativity and innovation - desire to learn and apply new technologies, products, and libraries  Willingness to coach and pair program with entry-level engineers The team Deloittes Government and Public Services (GPS) practice " our people, ideas, technology and outcomes"is designed for impact. Serving federal, state, & local government clients as well as public higher education institutions, our team of over 15,000+ professionals brings fresh perspective to help clients anticipate disruption, reimagine the possible, and fulfill their mission promise. Deloittes Cloud offering consists of engineers and technical thought leaders who build cloud solutions that help shape the future of global enterprises. Our Cloud team is at the heart of technical solutioning and at the leading edge of product development. Qualifications  Required:  Experience implementing wireframes or technical approaches with flexible, well-structured code  Comfortable with code versioning tools such as Git  Experience with SQL and NoSQL databases, including PostgreSQL and MongoDB  Experience with building, documenting, querying, and consuming RESTful APIs  Familiarity with Docker/Kubernetes and container-based environments  Bachelors degree required Must be legally authorized to work in the United States without the need for employer sponsorship, now or at any time in the future  Preferred:  Must be proficient in at least one modern web development language (Python, JavaScript, Java, Go) How you'll growAt Deloitte, our professional development plan focuses on helping people at every level of their career to identify and use their strengths to do their best work every day. From entry-level employees to senior leaders, we believe theres always room to learn. We offer opportunities to help sharpen skills in addition to hands-on experience in the global, fast-changing business world. From on-the-job learning experiences to formal development programs, our professionals have a variety of opportunities to continue to grow throughout their career.
